extendedInfo.description: The PM-Places entertaiment application will provide hot and sensual moments with your group of friend or your couple.The game consists on a single dice. Their face shows us everyday objects or places:- Bed- Chair- Car- Kitchen- Desk- Living RoomTo roll the dice you have to press the Play Bottom or shake the Phone and the animation of the dice will start. When the result appears, you can click on the imageand return to the main screeen or shake the phone to throw the dice again.Pressing the Menu you have the following options:- Enable or Disable sound- Quit the game- Game informationIDEAS FOR USING GRUOP PLAYIt chooses one of the people in the group before rolling the dice, and once the result shows us on the screeen, go to the place or site corresponding to do the action chosen above.The set of the actions that can be carried out betwen two people are the most diverse-Each participant brings their own limits.When participants have finished, your phone moves to the next perso, as before, have to choose one of the group and throw the dice.TO PLAY A COUPLEIs a very special experience, because it determines the use of places that could not have imagined, making your relationship with your partnermost unexpected and warm.LET YOUR IMAGINATION RUN AWAYIs an erotic foreplay to exploring new places with your friends or couple,The day you use it, could be unforgettable.KEEP ON EYE AT THE GAMES COMING UP SOON.....MORE VARIETY....Visit us at: www.pleasure-moments.com
